attributes.action: Stop the CSA taking everything i have.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The CSA have reassesed my case and have now told me they will take 40% of my income and i have to pay thousands in arrears due to their inability to get assesments correct. This will now leave my new family with a negative income of over £200 pm once all the other essential bills such as heating are paid.
Their reply is your in the military so we can take 40% no matter what your situation.
This is after i have always paid as directed and co-operated with them fully. I am as most paying NRP's are, easy targets and will be better off giving up a career and claiming unemployment! (Their words)
All for serving the country!

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual cases. Please rephrase your petition so that it is a clear call for action that makes a point about government policy.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
